title: SAUDIEXCELLENCECO
description: SaudiExcellenceCo's website is the proof that quality can be reached even with a short deadline. They came with a challenge: 10 days to create a unique website to showcase at the AI Summit in Duba√Ø. It took 8 days from the design to the creation and release.

title: MBUZZ Esports
description: MBUZZ Esports is brand new branch from MBUZZ. In a matter of a few days we managed to deliver a structured application with a playful design. We're proud of this collaboration which brought our website to the Gitex 2022.

title: SARAH ROI
description: Sarah is a pedagogical engineer working with the most luxurious brands in the world. She needed a solid website with a strong identity and a clear message. Checkout her amazing homepage!

title: OH MY FOOD
description: Oh My Food, a fictional application that showcase a succession of seemless animations and transitions.

title: Github
description: They are many more projects presents on my Github account, take a look if you're interested in them!
